text: Aru etu homoi te Jisu ke Pobitro Atma pora bisi khushi korise aru koise, “Moi Apuni ke dhanyavad di ase Baba, sorgo aru prithibi laga Probhu, kelemane Apuni etu sob kotha to gyaani aru bujhi bole pora manu khan logote lukai kene rakhise, aru etu sob kotha to chutu bacha khan ke janibole dise. Hoi Baba, etu sob Apuni usorte sabole bhal dikhe.”
